title: "US$2.9 million gene therapy for severe hemophilia is approved by U.S. FDA"
excerpt: "U.S. officials on Thursday approved drugmaker BioMarin's gene therapy for the most common form of hemophilia, a US$2.9 million infused treatment that can significantly reduce dangerous bleeding problems."
